keyEvents.title: Baratie Defense Battle with Raised Fins
keyEvents.description: Sanji orders the fins to be raised, creating battle platforms on either side of the restaurant to prevent interior damage during the fight with Krieg's crew.
keyEvents.significance: The fins become the main battlefield for the arc's climactic battles.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Pearl Battle on the Fins
keyEvents.description: The raised fin platforms serve as the arena for Sanji's battle against Pearl.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases the Baratie's unique defensive architecture.

description: A floating restaurant ship in the East Blue, known for its excellent cuisine and unique fin-raising defense mechanism.
